options.label: Get Account Info
options.name: getAccountInfo
options.description: Returns the account information of a given address.

options.label: Get Account Balance
options.name: getAccountBalance
options.description: Returns the balance of a given address.

options.label: Get Extrinsics
options.name: getExtrinsics
options.description: Returns the list of extrinsics performed by an address.

options.label: Get Transfers
options.name: getTransfers
options.description: Returns the list of transfers performed by an address.

options.label: Get Rewards
options.name: getRewards
options.description: Returns the list of rewards for a given address.

options.label: Get Slashes
options.name: getSlashes
options.description: Returns the list of slashes for a given address.

options.label: Get Staking Info
options.name: getStakingInfo
options.description: Returns the staking information for a given address.

options.label: Get Block Info
options.name: getBlockInfo
options.description: Returns information about a given block.

options.label: Get Event Info
options.name: getEventInfo
options.description: Returns information about a given event.
